Class CustomHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.rn2014.scanner.CustomHttpClient

  • public class CustomHttpClient
extends java.lang.Object
    Classe che contiene un HttpClient per effettuare richeste GET/POST
    Author:
    Nicola Corti
